```{r message=FALSE}
devtools::load_all(".")
devtools::wd()
analyzed_data <- readRDS("not_public/analyzed_data.rds")
```

Make offence variables factors.
```{r}
library(dplyr)
analyzed_data <-
analyzed_data %>% 
  mutate_at(.vars = vars(starts_with("o_")), factor)
```


```{r}
vars_to_desc <- 
  variable_table$Variable[variable_table$Desciptives == c("num", "cat")]
descriptive_stats <- 
  furniture::table1(analyzed_data[c(vars_to_desc, "reoff_category")],
                  splitby = reoff_category, type = c("condenced"))

devtools::use_data(descriptive_stats, overwrite = TRUE)
```
